All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
The main class containing the GameLoop
Crop
A crop is an object that can be planted on a tile.
Farmer
The farmer is the main actor in FarmerType
FarmerType
FarmerType represents the different types of farmers in the game.
FarmLand
The FarmLand is the playing area of the game.
Fertilizer
The fertilizer class encapsulates the fertilization process used by the farmer
HarvestRange
HarvestRange represents the minimum and maximum harvest amount of a crop.
Pickaxe
The pickaxe class encapsulates the pickaxe tool used by the farmer
Plow
The pickaxe class encapsulates the plow tool used by the farmer
Report
A report is a rich message return from a method call.
Seed
A seed creates a crop and holds/dictates its corresponding attributes
Shovel
The shovel class encapsulates the shovel tool used by the farmer
Tile
A tile holds and allows a crop to be planted and grow
Tool
Tool is a wrapper class that serves to encapsulate cost and expGain
WateringCan
The watering can class encapsulates the watering can tool used by the farmer
